t: Billy Joel Vinyl Records ‚Äî Dutch Vinyl Record Store
s: Billy Joel is an American singer-songwriter, composer, and pianist. He is one of the best-selling music artists of all time, with over 150 million records sold worldwide. His career spans over 50 years, beginning with the release of his debut album, Cold Spring Harbor, in 1971.
